logoPlaceholder.title: Starbucks Demo Brand Identity
logoPlaceholder.description: Custom-designed logo placeholder for Starbucks Demo brand.
logoPlaceholder.rationale: A stylized, handcrafted coffee cup icon, symbolizing premium quality and warmth.

taglineSuggestions: Where every cup tells a story
Crafting moments, one cup at a time
Experience the art of handcrafted coffee
brandVoiceDescription: Warm, inviting, and expertly crafted, our brand voice is a reflection of the Starbucks Demo café experience.

socialMockups.description: Feature a visually appealing image of a handcrafted coffee drink
Highlight a customer testimonial or a behind-the-scenes look at our coffee-making process

collateralMockups.description: Design a premium business card with a custom color scheme and the Starbucks Demo logo
Create a visually appealing email newsletter with a clear call-to-action

websiteHeaderDescription: Welcome to the Starbucks Demo website, where you can explore our premium handcrafted coffee, beverages, and café experience.

campaignDirections.title: The Art of Handcrafted Coffee
campaignDirections.concept: Highlight the expertise and craftsmanship that goes into creating each cup of coffee
campaignDirections.suggestedVisuals: High-quality images of baristas in action, with a focus on the coffee-making process

campaignDirections.title: Third Place Between Home and Work
campaignDirections.concept: Emphasize the Starbucks Demo café experience as a welcoming and comfortable space
campaignDirections.suggestedVisuals: Images of customers relaxing in the café, with a focus on the comfortable atmosphere and high-quality coffee

nextSteps: Develop a comprehensive social media strategy
Design a series of engaging email newsletters
Create a content calendar to support the campaign directions
